pr_title: CFM-1168 Add support for external databases in DataHub

timeline.message: CFM-1168 Add support for external databases in DataHub

timeline.bodyText: is external database supported for GCP? will it be for 7.2.7?
timeline.author: pvillard31

replies.bodyText:
is external database supported for GCP? will it be for 7.2.7?

@pvillard31, i asked Richard about that and he said that Cloudbreak will support external db for GCP in 2.35 Cloudbreak version. According to "Cloudbreak Release Schedule" (https://cloudera.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/ENG/pages/610469693/Cloudbreak+Release+Schedule), this functionality should be available on prod in the middle of December, on mow-dev it should be available on the beginning of December. So looks like its actual for 7.2.7.
replies.author: vbrodetskyi

timeline.bodyText: I wonder if HA databases are also supported in GCP yet. If not, this may be ignored silenty (and provision a non-HA DB instead), or it may also cause data hub provisioning abort if the HA availability is expressly forbidden. 😃
timeline.author: lajosrodek

replies.bodyText: @lajosrodek  i asked Richard about that and he said that Cloudbreak will support external db for GCP in 2.35 Cloudbreak version. According to "Cloudbreak Release Schedule" (https://cloudera.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/ENG/pages/610469693/Cloudbreak+Release+Schedule), this functionality should be available on prod in the middle of December, on mow-dev it should be available on the beginning of December. So looks like its actual for 7.2.7.
replies.author: vbrodetskyi
